body_html:
An HTTP error occurred when trying to retrieve this URL.
HTTP errors are often intermittent, and a simple retry will get you on your way.'

It looks like for some reason it is not finishing the download.

You can try to do the following:

conda clean
conda install -y conda
conda install -y magma-cuda80 -c soumith

Also, go to https://conda.anaconda.org in your browser and see if it is blocked by your local firewall or proxy.

body:
> An HTTP error occurred when trying to retrieve this URL.
> HTTP errors are often intermittent, and a simple retry will get you on your way.'

It looks like for some reason it is not finishing the download.

You can try to do the following:

```
conda clean
conda install -y conda
conda install -y magma-cuda80 -c soumith
```

Also, go to  https://conda.anaconda.org in your browser and see if it is blocked by your local firewall or proxy.
